Army of Gothmog.warning: The Army of Gothmog must always contain Gothmog, who is always the Army's General.

Assault Upon Helm's Deep.warning: An Assault Upon Helm's Deep Army must always contain an Uruk-hai Captain, who is always the Army's General.

Atop the Walls.warning: An Atop the Walls Army must include Gandalf the White, who is always the Army's General.

Barad-dur.warning: A Barad-dur Army must always contain Sauron, who is always the Army's General.

Beseigers of the Hornburg.warning: A Besiegers of the Hornburg Army must include Wulf, who is always the Army's General.

Breaking of the Fellowship.warning: A Breaking of the Fellowship Army must include Aragorn, Strider who is always the Army's General.

Cirith Ungol.warning: A Cirith Ungol Army must always contain Shagrat, who is always the Army's General.
A Cirith Ungol Army must always contain Gorbag.

Corsair Fleet.warning: A Corsair Fleets Army must always contain a Corsair Captain, who is always the Army's General.

Defenders of Helm's Deep.warning: A Defenders of Helm's Deep Army must include Théoden, King of Rohan, who is always the Army's General.

Fangorn.warning: A Fangorn Army must always contain Treebeard, who is always the Army's General.

Garrison of Ithilien.warning: A Garrison of Ithilien Army must include Faramir, Captain of Gondor, who is always the Army's General.

Lindon.warning: A Lindon Army must include Gil-galad, High King of the Noldor, who is always the Army's General.

Lurtz's Scouts.warning: A Lurtz's Scouts Army must always contain Lurtz, who is always the Army's General.

Men of the West.warning: A Men of the West Army must include Aragorn, King Elessar, who is always the Army's General.

Minas Morgul.warning: A Minas Morgul Army must always contain the Witch-king of Angmar, who is always the Army's General.

Muster of Isengard.warning: A Muster of Isengard Army must always contain Saruman, who is always the Army's General.

Reclamation of Osgiliath.warning: A Reclamation of Osgiliath Army must include Boromir, Captain of the White Tower, who is always the Army's General.

Return of the King.warning: A Return of the King Army must include the King of the Dead.
A Return of the King Army must include Aragorn, Strider, who is always the Army's General.

Ride Out.warning: A Ride Out Army must always contain Theoden, who is always the Army's General.

Riders of Eomer.warning: A Riders of Eomer Army must include Eomer, who is always the Army's General.

Riders of Theoden.warning: A Riders of Theoden Army must always contain Theoden, who is always the Army's General.

Road to Helm's Deep.warning: A Road to Helm's Deep Army must always contain Théoden, who is always the Army's General.

Road to Rivendell.warning: A Road to Rivendell Army must include Frodo.

The Black Gate.warning: A Black Gate Army must always contain the Mouth of Sauron.
A Black Gate Army must always contain a Mordor Troll Chieftain, who is always the Army's General.

The Black Riders.warning: A Black Riders Army must always contain the Witch-king of Angmar, who is always the Army's General.

The Last Alliance.warning: A Last Alliance Army must include at least one Unique Numenor Hero.
A Last Alliance Army must include at least one Unique Rivendell Hero.

Ugluk's Scouts.warning: An Ugluk's Scouts Army must always contain Ugluk, who is always the Army's General.

Wolves of Isengard.warning: A Wolves of Isengard Army must always contain Sharku, who is always the Army's General.

[garrison-of-ithilien] samwise-gamgee.warning: You may only include Sam if your Army also includes Frodo.

[garrison-of-ithilien] smeagol.warning: You may only include Smeagol if your Army includes Frodo and Sam.

[realms-of-men] captain-of-arnor.warning: A Captain of Arnor may only be included if your army also contains a King of Men (Arnor)

[realms-of-men] captain-of-dale.warning: A Captain of Dale may only be included if your army also contains a King of Men (Dale)

[realms-of-men] captain-of-minas-tirith.warning: A Captain of Minas Tirith may only be included if your army also contains a King of Men (Gondor)

[realms-of-men] captain-of-numenor.warning: A Captain of Numenor may only be included if your army also contains a King of Men (Numenor)

[realms-of-men] captain-of-rohan.warning: A Captain of Rohan may only be included if your army also contains a King of Men (Rohan)

[realms-of-men] gondor-battlecry-trebuch.warning: A Gondor Battlecry Trebuchet may only be included if your army also contains a King of Men (Gondor)

[realms-of-men] windlance.warning: A Windlance may only be included if your army also contains a King of Men (Dale)
